name: Armageddon (itch) (Electric Dreams)
description:
Armageddon is the first game project I have done to test Love2d framework at the beginning of 2017.

It is inspired by video games I used to play on my Atari 2600 Video Computer System in early 80's.

No extraterrestrial invasion, but a rain of meteorites you must  destroyed before the largest cities of the Earth are erased.

A very short game where you can not win.

I hope you will have some pleasure to test it.
